post.title: New Patterns and Practices
post.content: Three new application blocks are up on MSDN: Service Aggregation, Asynchronous Invocation and Caching. There’s also a great new guide on ASP.NET security: Improving Web Application Security: Threats and Countermeasures. These are both part of the overall patterns & practices guidance that Microsoft is publishing. However, the P&P site moved recently and doesn’t seem to have any of these new publications listed yet, though some are listed on the “Coming Soon” page.
